meanings.definition: The quality or state of being voluminous.
meanings.sent1: Her dress's voluminousness made her look like a princess.
meanings.sent2: The voluminousness of the clouds indicated an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to hide in the voluminousness of the curtains was comical.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousness of her laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousness of the library overwhelmed the bookworm with delight.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of something in three dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The voluminousness of the box surprised me when I opened it.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the voluminousness of the mountain in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The voluminousness of the cake was so big that it barely fit in the fridge.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousness of the ocean stretched endlessly before us.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousness of the tree's branches provided ample shade on hot days.

meanings.definition: The amount of space occupied by something.
meanings.sent1: The voluminousness of the suitcase allowed her to pack all her clothes.
meanings.sent2: The voluminousness of the warehouse impressed the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The voluminousness of the traffic jam caused frustration among drivers.
meanings.sent4: The voluminousness of the crowd made it hard to see the stage.
meanings.sent5: The voluminousness of the blanket kept them warm on cold nights.
